Larry Kudlow , director of the National Economic Council , lashed out at Canadian Prime Minster Justin Trudeau as “ amateurish ” and “ sophomoric ” for [ARG1: a news conference] [ARG0: he] [V: gave] [ARGM-TMP: after Trump left the Group of Seven summit on Saturday] .
